sentences.en: A benign tumour will not cause you any fatal harm.
sentences.cn: 良性肿瘤不会对你有致命的伤害.

sentences.en: And out there was the benign and smiling sea.
sentences.cn: 离大楼不远,就是碧波荡漾的大海.

sentences.en: Benign enzootic paresis affects young , unweaned piglets for the most part.
sentences.cn: 良性地方性轻瘫大部分侵害未断乳小猪.

sentences.en: Dr. Bledsoe sat with a benign smile of inward concentration.
sentences.cn: 布莱索博士坐在椅子上,思想集中,脸上露出了一副宽厚的笑容.

sentences.en: He shook his head in benign amusement.
sentences.cn: 他被逗乐了，和蔼地摇了摇头。

sentences.en: In Soapy's opinion the Law was more benign than Philanthropy.
sentences.cn: 在索比眼里,法律比救济更为宽厚.

sentences.en: It wasn't cancer, only a benign tumour.
sentences.cn: 这不是癌症，只是良性肿瘤。

sentences.en: Martha is a benign old lady.
sentences.cn: 玛莎是个仁慈的老妇人.

sentences.en: Most of these tumors are benign.
Not all robots will be so benign.
sentences.cn: 并非所有的机器人都是那么温良恭俭让的.

sentences.en: The action was so graceful and inclusively benign.
sentences.cn: 这个动作是这样优雅、这样地充满了慈祥.

sentences.en: The treatment of benign tumors is extirpative.
sentences.cn: 良性肿瘤的治疗是摘除.

sentences.en: They are normally a more benign audience.
sentences.cn: 他们通常观看时比较温和。

sentences.en: They enjoyed an especially benign climate.
sentences.cn: 他们那里的气候非常宜人。

sentences.en: This plunge came in a time of relatively benign economic conditions.
sentences.cn: 这次大跌出现在相对良好的经济环境下。

sentences.en: We're taking relatively benign medicines and we're turning them into poisons.
sentences.cn: 我们服的药相对来说药性温和，但是我们却在把它们变成毒药。

words.tran_cn: 良性的；仁慈的；有益的；和蔼的
[肿瘤]良性的；和蔼的，亲切的；吉利的

trans.tran_cn: 温和的，（肿瘤）良性的，宜人的
trans.tran_en: a benign  tumour (=  unnatural growth in the body  )  is not caused by  cancer
